item.description:
Happy Thanksgiving! The biggest travel holiday of the year....
We just decided to host a supper here Friday eve, the day after Thanksgiving, for anyone who is in town. If you can join us please do, friends welcome but RSVP please!

The closest T stop is Silver Line bus Newton St. and the closest T is Orange Line Back Bay or Mass Ave.

If you'd like to bring a dish to share or beverages please do, but it's not necessary. We'll be happy to see you.

PLEASE NOTE: This is NOT a speak-Chinese-only event! But you are welcome to form a subgroup to chat :)
ESOL Meetup is also invited.

Rhys
item.how_to_find_us: Please rsvp! Call or email for directions, I'll check up til the afternoon

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Friday eve Thanksgiving supper
